Chapter 16 L: geom_l… 16.1 geom_label Package: ggplot2 (Wickham et al. 2023) Description: Thisis used to add labeled text to a plot. It allows you to annotate specific data points or regions in your plot with text labels. This also draws a rectangle around the text. Understandable aesthetics: label, fill(controls the background colour of the label) , colour, fontface Statistics layer(s): count See also: geom_text, geom_label_repel 16.2 geom_label_repel ggplot(elephants.subset.100, aes(y = Height, x=Weight)) + geom_point() + ggrepel::geom_label_repel(aes(y = Height, x=Weight, label = rownames(elephants.subset.100)), fontface = 'bold', color = 'red', box.padding = unit(0.40, "lines"), point.padding = unit(0.6, "lines"), segment.color = 'grey50' ) 16.3 geom_lm References
